title: Patch Notes
content: if you move it outside the boundaries of the wine festival. This will prevent Roger from, for example, appearing at your camp if you move Cora's corpse to your Traveller's Chest. Fixed an overhead dialogue about Gale triggering even if he's not in the party. The courier informed us that he found a lost letter from the Grove that was meant to arrive at an important party. It's now been sent on its rightful way. The Steel Watchers at Baldur's Mouth no longer sometimes slack off on their security
